articles.title: China's new path to greater influence in Asia - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: The Silk Road was central to China's success story in the middle ages. Kingshuk Nag's book 'A New Silk Road' unpacks how China is building such a road to power again and what it will mean for the geopolitics of Asia.
